org.svvrl.goal.cmd
Interface CommandExtension

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractCommandExtension, ComplementExtension, DefaultCommandExtension, SolveExtension
public interface CommandExtension

This interface is used to extend the commands of GOAL. Basically, this interface provides meta-information about a command to be added. The meta-information of a command includes the command name, the full name (for display only), the help message, and the class of command invocations. An invocation (execution) of a command with specified arguments corresponds to an object of CommandExpression.

Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai
